alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 2:20AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CAMPBELL COUNTY THROUGH 245 AM MDT... At 220 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Gillette, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gillette around 225 AM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 116 and 137. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
